title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in dataset not reflected in expression builder
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are displayed instead of the alias names. This occurs even after setting aliases for the columns in the dataset.
EB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the column names should be replaced with the corresponding alias names. According to scr 78193 in the tracker, the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select a dataset that has columns with alias names.
3. Double click on the first column name in the expression builder.

Expected result:
The column name displayed should be the alias name, not the original name.
